Can people stop talking about how they're greedy for money? "Well if you liked education then the book would be free!" Yea, but the book required hours upon hours of researching, drawing, not to mention writing and editing the sentences to make them most understandable. The book wasn't free to make, so don't bash them for not making it free.

Also, this channel doesn't just "do 60 minutes of research and throw it into a video." It takes a lot of time and planning to structure the video and figure out how it will flow, as well as make transitions between topics smooth and not feel forced. Making the drawings good without whiteboard smears takes time, as does recording the audio.

I, personally, like hearing the voice over the drawings explain it to me in a digestible format. It doesn't mean I can't do the research myself, but I enjoy this presentation. Stop accusing them of being a "sellout" because they wrote a book and "Gosh!" it's not only not free, but... they are promoting it! What monsters!
